snippet: Two of the Tibetans, teenage Buddhist monks, were charged with helping a fellow monk burn himself to death, and two were charged with leaking news of the protests.
abstract: Four Tibetans, including two teenage Buddhist monks, have been given lengthy prison terms for supporting the resistance movement to Chinese rule that has involved the self-immolation of more than 50 people since 2009.
lead_paragraph: Two of the Tibetans, teenage Buddhist monks, were charged with helping a fellow monk burn himself to death, and two were charged with leaking news of the protests.

headline.seo: China Jails 4 Tibetans in Self-Immolation Movement
headline.main: China Jails 4 Tibetans Linked to Self-Immolation Protests
headline.print_headline: China Jails 4 Tibetans Linked to Self-Immolation Protests
